results.title: Life or Something Like It
results.creator_credit: 20th Century Fox, Monarchy Enterprises S.a.r.l., Regency Enterprises, Davis Entertainment, New Regency Pictures, Epsilon Motion Pictures, Atchity Entertainment International (AEI), Bill Groom, Aggie Guerard Rodgers, Dana Stevens, Stephen Herek and John Scott Shepherd
results.headline_credit: Canada and United States of America, 2002
results.brief_description: A reporter Lanie Kerrigan interviews a psychic homeless man for a fluff piece about a football game’s score. Instead he tells her that her life has no meaning and is going to end in just a few days, which sparks her to action, trying to change the pattern of her life…
results.creator_credit_for_label: 20th Century Fox, Monarchy Enterprises S.a.r.l., Regency Enterprises, Davis Entertainment, New Regency Pictures, Epsilon Motion Pictures, Atchity Entertainment International (AEI), Bill Groom, Aggie Guerard Rodgers, Dana Stevens, Stephen Herek and John Scott Shepherd

results.title: Lichtspiel: Opus I
results.brief_description: Against a dark background, several bright, curved or rounded shapes pulse towards the center of the screen, one at a time. They are followed by many other shapes, some irregular, some pointed, others rounded. The abstract shapes move into or across the screen in harmony with the musical score.

constellations_other.name: Colour and illusion
constellations_other.description: Exploring the science of colour, light, reflection and movement.

results.description: Against a dark background, several bright, curved or rounded shapes pulse towards the center of the screen, one at a time. They are followed by many other shapes, some irregular, some pointed, others rounded. The abstract shapes move into or across the screen in harmony with the musical score.

results.title: Let It Be
results.creator_credit: ABKCO Films, Mal Evans, Allen Klein, Apple Corps, Michael Lindsay-Hogg and Neil Aspinall
results.brief_description: Documentary film about The Beatles rehearsing and recording songs for the album Let It Be in January 1969. The film features an unannounced rooftop concert by the group, their last performance in public. Released just after the album, it was the final original Beatles release. This film has not been commercially available since the 1980s.

constellations_other.name: Raising the Roof: on-screen levity on rooftop
constellations_other.description: Performances soar to new heights on the rooftop, not only showcasing skylines but also creating electrifying drama, comedy and spectacle.

results.creator_credit_for_label: ABKCO Films, Mal Evans, Allen Klein, Apple Corps, Michael Lindsay-Hogg and Neil Aspinall
results.description: Documentary film about The Beatles rehearsing and recording songs for the album Let It Be in January 1969. results.title: Legion
results.brief_description: David Haller, AKA Legion, is a troubled young man who may be more than human.

constellations_other.name: VFX to fantasy and freedom
constellations_other.description: Founded in Sydney, and now with offices worldwide, Animal Logic are an Academy Award-winning VFX and animation studio whose job is to bring the impossible to life. And they're in good company with these other artists and filmmakers.

results.description: David Haller, AKA Legion, is a troubled young man who may be more than human. Diagnosed as schizophrenic, David has been in and out of psychiatric hospitals for years. But after a strange encounter with a fellow patient, he’s confronted with the possibility that the voices he hears and the visions he sees might be real.
description_for_label: David Haller, AKA Legion, is a troubled young man who may be more than human. Diagnosed as schizophrenic, David has been in and out of psychiatric hospitals for years. But after a strange encounter with a fellow patient, he’s confronted with the possibility that the voices he hears and the visions he sees might be real.

results.title: Lawless
results.creator_credit: Margot Wilson, Doug Wick, Megan Ellison, The Weinstein Company, Benaroya Pictures, Yucaipa Films, Annapurna Pictures, Pie Films Inc., Red Wagon Entertainment, Revolt Films, Blum Hanson Allen Films, Lucy Fisher, Nick Cave, John Hillcoat and Chris Kennedy
results.brief_description: Set in the Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a bootlegging gang is threatened by authorities who want a cut of their profits.

constellations_other.name: Outlaws and the end
constellations_other.description: Tracing connections from Sweet Country to Australian westerns and resistance to white colonial narratives.

results.title: Land Girls
results.brief_description: The lives, loves and highs and lows of four members of the Women’s Land Army working at the Hoxley Estate during World War II.
results.description: The lives, loves and highs and lows of four members of the Women’s Land Army working at the Hoxley Estate during World War II.

results.title: La Cerca
results.brief_description: Edward James Olmos narrates this multi-fest winner about an immigrant who recalls a vivid and momentous memory where he discovered his boundaries.

constellations_other.name: Aquaman VFX
constellations_other.description: As well as becoming a global box-office sensation, Aquaman (2018) featured groundbreaking visual effects from Australian companies such as Method Studios.

results.description: Edward James Olmos narrates this multi-fest winner about an immigrant who recalls a vivid and momentous memory where he discovered his boundaries.

results.title: Kung Fu Panda
results.creator_credit: DreamWorks Animation, Mark Osborne, John Stevenson, Glenn Berger, Jonathan Aibel and Raymond Zibach
results.brief_description: When the Valley of Peace is threatened, lazy Po the panda discovers his destiny as the “chosen one” and trains to become a kung fu hero, but transforming the unsleek slacker into a brave warrior won’t be easy. It’s up to Master Shifu and the Furious Five — Tigress, Crane, Mantis, Viper and Monkey — to give it a try.

constellations_other.name: Right on cue
constellations_other.description: In the silent film era, cue sheets charted major moments of a film, along with recommended audio accompaniment matching the action on screen.

results.creator_credit_for_label: DreamWorks Animation, Mark Osborne, John Stevenson, Glenn Berger, Jonathan Aibel and Raymond Zibach

results.title: Kokoda Front Line!
results.brief_description: This iconic and Academy Award-winning newsreel shot by Damien Parer contains some of the most recognised images of Australian troops in the Second World War.
results.description: This iconic and Academy Award-winning newsreel shot by Damien Parer contains some of the most recognised images of Australian troops in the Second World War.

results.title: Kino-Pravda No. 1
results.brief_description: Dziga Vertov-directed Soviet newsreel covering: Starving children / Requisitioning of valuables possessed by the Russian Orthodox Church / Fundraising flights in support of the hungry / Trial of the Socialist Revolutionaries.

constellations_other.name: Film-truth
constellations_other.description: The experimental documentary Man with a Movie Camera has had a lasting impact on the development of film styles.
